title: Climb Hero
description: He trained and gained strength for years and now he wants to show everyone that he is the climb hero. Help him choose the right stones and climb together to the very top of the mountain. Can you do it with one try?
instructions: It's very simple. The hero is hanging on a stone and your task is to tap at the right moment to make him hang on another stone. Along the way, you collect diamonds for which you can customize your character.

title: CPL Tournament 2020
description: "It's cricket time and what could be better than to have a cool cricket game on this cricket fever occasion? CPL tournament is for cricket lovers. With great graphics and awesome sounds effects, you gonna love this. There are 2 modes. Prepare yourself for a big CPL Tournament while playing single matches mode. So wear your helmet & pad up to improve your batting skills. After that when you get pro in that, choose your favorite CPL team and get started competing with other teams. You can play 2, 5 or 10 overs. Just tap on the screen to hit a shot. You have to win 4 matches to reach the quarterfinal. every match, you have to chase a target of specific balls. Win the CPL tournament by hitting some cool shots. "So, Grab your bat and start hitting big sixes because it's time to play CPL tournament."
instructions: Tap on the Screen to Hit the shot.

title: Skateboard Master
description: This is a fun adventure game. Play as the protagonist and start surfing on skateboards. It will test the player's flexible control over the character. You need to constantly adjust the sensitivity to challenge various different level problems!
instructions: Use mouse to control

title: Pool Mania
description: Challenge your intellect and skills in this one-of-a-kind pool game. Collect stars and unlock stronger cues so you can beat harder levels. Play pool, roam through levels, and collect all the special cues.
instructions: Use your cue to shoot balls into holes, gain score and stars so you can progress further, and unlock more powerful cues. Use your skill and intellect to solve the levels, but beware, they get harder as the game goes on.

title: Fail Run Online
description: Fail Run Online is an enchanting casual game. As the saying goes, a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. It is not that simple to make every step in a well-balanced manner. This game will not only help you appreciate your own gait in reality but also train your patience as you adjust the step for the character in the game not to stumble.
instructions: Click or tap to play.

title: 8 Ball Pool Challenge
description: 8 Ball Pool Challenge-The pro arcade style pool game with single player. 8 Ball League takes the latest technology to create the most realistic and amazing 8 Ball simulator. Fantastic playability and ultra realistic ball physics will refresh your pool game experience. Challenge a variety of stylish new level of different ability from beginner right up to pro level. Train your skills, improve your game and defeat the opposition to gain access to new city bars.
instructions: Touch control Or Mouse to move the stick

title: Swimming Hero
description: Tap to change lanes in this endless swimming game. Collect snorkels to boost your speed. Collect shields to protect yourself. How high can you score in this indoor pro swimming pool game?
instructions: Swim fast and avoid obstacles

title: TRZ Athletic Games
description: This is a 10 in 1 game with Olympic athletic sports such as Dash (100, 400 and 800 meters), Longjump, Highjump, Javelin, Hurdles, Pole vault, Discus, Shot pot.
instructions: Touch in the buttons in the screen to run and jump/throw or use your keyboard (Arrows and keys 'A' and 'D')

title: Drunken Tug War
description: The Drunken game series continues with Tug War in its new episode. The aim of the game is to pull the rope as fast as possible and pull your opponent to your side. The green radioactive area in the middle eliminates players. Each time you touch this area, your health bar will drop. Press the keys as fast as you can and pull the opponent. Drunken Tug War has 1P and 2P modes. The first to reach a score of 5 in the game wins the match!
instructions: Player 1: "W" Player 2: "UP ARROW"

title: Drunken Wrestle
description: The Drunken game series continues with a fun wrestle game. The goal is not to let your head touch the ground and of course, touching the opponent's head to the ground. Each different level has different conditions. Variable conditions and level designs affect wrestling, so you must find new tactics... Drunken Wrestle has 1P and 2P modes. The first to reach a score of 5 in the game wins the match!
instructions: Player 1: "W". Player 2: "UP ARROW".

title: Fish Gone
description: Fishing Gone it is a very fun and relaxing game. The objective of the game is to fish as many fish as you can. Be careful there is a fish that is there to hinder your fishing.
instructions: Use the mouse or touch to interact.

title: Boxing Random
description: The most fun and random challenges begin with Boxing Random. Each round starts another fun with its own options. Sometimes long arms, sometimes icy field or rocket punches greet you. Send punches to the enemy's head. You can score this way. The first to reach a score of 5 wins the game!
instructions: Player 1: "W" Player 2: "UP ARROW KEY" You can play the game by touch controls on mobile devices or tablets.

title: Portal Billiards
description: In this billiards game variant, pockets are not just pockets. These are Portals! The game takes place in a space, sci-fi ambience, like if a billiard table was installed in a spaceship.
instructions: There are balls of two colors - the blue and the red ones. Players should pocket balls into the portals with the respective color, the red into the red, the blue into the blue. After every shot, the portals randomly change their positions in the pockets.

title: Douchebag Workout
description: Get ripped in Ultimate Douchebag Workout! Make sure you look sharp by exercising and flexing those muscles! Give nature a little hand by using some herbs and other (un)healthy stuff. It does not matter how you get there, as long as you get there! Get some swag, a tan, some bigger arms and the greatest abs the world has ever seen. All to become the Ultimate Douchebag!
instructions: Click on items inside the game to interact. Use spacebar to pump those finger muscles!

title: Shaun The Sheep Alien Athletics
description: Run away from alien creatures in Shaun the Sheep Alien Athletics! You must help Shaun jump over obstacles, and try not to fall or the Aliens will abduct you!
instructions: Jump by using the spacebar or your mouse.

title: LaneChage 3D
description: 1. Players will start the most exciting and cool driving simulation game; 2. Start this perfect challenge, experience this amazing game playing method, and challenge more joy; 3. Every time the player needs to face the endless traffic, carefully control your car.
instructions: 1. Start the most exciting and joyful game challenge and feel the more interesting game; 2. Players need to continuously complete one new level after another through your challenges; 3. Feel the simple Q version of the game screen and start the perfect

title: ICC T20 WORLDCUP
description: ICC T20 WORLDCUP HTML5 is a cricket game in which you have select between 8 international team. Both batting as well as bowling features is available in game with first match ending and second one starting. You can select between bowling and batting in first match by winning the coin toss. You can select up to 20 overs for balls in the game.
instructions: Controls For PC: Bowling—Click left mouse button when the arrow is straight for accurate Bowling. Batting—Use keyboard arrow key to change position of batter and touch anywhere on the screen to hit the ball. Hint: Touch the screen when blipper bleeps above bowler. Controls For Mobile: Bowling—Touch anywhere when the arrow is straight for accurate Bowling. Batting—Use arrow key from screen to change position of batter and touch anywhere on the screen to hit the ball.

title: Cycle Extreme
description: Take part in a mountain bike downhill racing challenge. You control a bicycle rushing down from the mountains. Be careful - the track is very steep, and there are several obstacles and deadly holes ahead. Be careful and finish each of 20 levels as fast as you can to gain 3 stars! 1.0.16
instructions: Up or W - speed up Down or S - break Left or A - lean left Right or D - lean right

title: Ski King
description: Carve your way through mountains. Avoid trees and rocks and skid over icy snow. Explore every slope and find the shortest way down the hill. Finish with best times to complete this skiing adventure.
instructions: Find the shortest track down and try to avoid all obstacles in your way. Level resets if you pass a flag from the wrong side. Use upgrade points to improve your skills. Each skill affects your skiing style differently.

title: Shaun The Sheep Chick n Spoon
description: Help Shaun the Sheep run as far as you can, but be careful! He's holding an egg in the spoon! Collect as many stars as you can by throwing the egg into the air. The stars will reward you points. If the egg, or chicken, drops you will lose a life, if you lose all three lives you have to start over.
instructions: Use the arrow keys to move.

title: Shaun The Sheep Baahmy Golf
description: Help Shaun the Sheep score by smashing things as much as possible! Shoot the ball and play golf at the farm full with obstacles like tractors, bales of straw, scarecrows and so on. You will have five attempts to get the ball into the hole.
instructions: Set the ball's angle and power by clicking the buttons or use the spacebar. Use your mouse or spacebar to control the flippers while the ball is in play.

title: Volley Random
description: he fun random game series continues with Volley Random. There is a Volleyball experience unlike any before. With fun ragdoll physics and a variety of variations, each match will be different. The playing court, ball and players may change. The important thing is to be able to get score under all conditions.
instructions: Player 1: "W" Player 2: "UP ARROW KEY" You can play the game by touch controls on mobile devices or tablets.

title: Drunken Boxing
description: The Drunken battles continues with the new game. In Drunken Boxing, the Drunken Boxers come to the arena and try to knock out each other. You can make quick punches in the game, but watch out for your Energy Bar! Drunken Boxing game has 1P and 2P modes. You can play the game from both PC and mobile devices. The first to reach a score of 5 in the game wins the match!
instructions: PLAYER 1: "ARROW KEYS" PLAYER 2: "W,A,S,D" You can use the left and right sides on touch screens.

title: Extreme Golf
description: Extreme Golf is an online golf game, you need to control a guy to shoot golf balls, if you shoot one ball into the hole, you will get one point or you will lose a ball. Play the game and see how many score you can get. Good Luck!
instructions: Touch and hold, release to shoot.

title: Champions Slot
description: Champions Slot is a HTML5 Casino Game. Try your luck with this one line slot machine with classic sport symbols! Place your bet, and spin the slot! Cross your fingers and hope for the best combination of symbols.
instructions: Click the spin button to launch the slot

title: GP Ski Slalom
description: GP Ski Slalom is a HTML5 Sport Game. Go around gates to complete the track and try to improve your best time on each track! Game Features: - Three players available! Select your favorite skier between male, female, and Santa;-)! -12 Levels of increasing difficulty -High-quality 3D Graphics
instructions: Use left and right arrow

title: Ski Jump
description: SKI JUMP is a phenomenal ski jumping game that offers many different game modes and 55 ski jumps from K50 to K250. If you have ever played DSJ, you must try SKI JUMP
instructions: start - right mouse button take-off - click with the right mouse button control - use the mouse up/down to maintain the optimal position of the skier landing - click with the right mouse button (or simply both buttons at the same time

title: Tennis Masters
description: Become a tennis master and show all your competitor talents to beat your opponents in the game Tennis Masters. You can play against the computer, or against a friend in 2 player mode! Collect power-ups and funny transformations. Have fun!
instructions: Player 1 Controls Arrow keys to move X to hit and Z to smash Player 2 Controls WASD to move L to hit and K to smash

title: Stickman Sports Badminton
description: Different Stickman characters meet in Stickman Sports Badminton game! The game will give you a good badminton experience with its realistic ball physics. At the same time, the boosters for the game (big racket, fireball, faster) and some negative bonuses  (slowly) increase the fun. You can play the game for 1 Player or 2 Players. There are "Normal" and "Hard" game modes when playing against the CPU. You can choose the number of sets in the game as 5,7 or 9. Show who is the better badminton player now!
instructions: PLAYER 1 Move / Jump : "W,A,S,D" Swing Racket : "SPACE" PLAYER 2 Move / Jump : "ARROW KEYS" Swing Racket : "M"

title: Pool 8 Ball
description: Pool 8 Ball is a modern pool that can be played alone on a timer as well as together on the same device. Rules like in a real 8-ball pool. Good luck to you, gentlemen!
instructions: PC controls: Mouse. Touch Control works on all browsers and all mobile devices!

title: Spinball 3D
description: Spinball is a new 3D HTML5 pong game for PC and mobile devices, similar to an old Flash game (Curveball) from the early 2000s. Attempt to beat the computer over levels of increasing difficulty and see how your high score compares to other players.
instructions: Control bat with mouse (or touch screen on mobile) - Swipe the bat up while hitting the ball to apply top spin. The ball will spin forwards and accelerate downwards. - Swipe the bat down while hitting the ball to apply back spin. The ball will spin backwards and accelerate upwards. - Likewise applying side-spin causes the ball to swerve to either side. - See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magnus_effect

title: Tug of Heads
description: Tug of Heads is a fun wrestling game that can be played for 1 and 2 Player. There are more than 50 hand-designed levels in the game that will surprise you. The aim of the players is to protect the heads of the characters from danger in wrestling. Game conditions will change at every level! You can play this fun wrestling against your friend or the CPU. Choose how many sets to play and start the wrestling!
instructions: Player 1: "W,A,D" Player 2: "UP, LEFT, RIGHT ARROW KEYS" You can play the game by touch controls on mobile devices or tablets.

title: Moto Maniac 3
description: This is a tilty bike game that will challenge your trial skills to the max. The trial competition is set up in the forest, so be ready to climb over trees and rocks. Your main goal is to overcome all the obstacles as fast as you can. But there is a second (yet important) goal - a wild bear was annoyed by the loud engine sounds and it is chasing you, so be quick not to be caught by the beast!
instructions: Up (or W)/Down (or S) - Drive forward/backward Left (or A)/Right (or D) - Tilt left/right P - pause

title: Tennis Champions 2020
description: Tennis Champions 2020 is the real tennis game featured with all official rules as in real tennis championship tournaments .It has 3 modes World Tour ,Quick Play and practice sets.Its a one click game.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: 3d Billiard Piramid
description: 3d Billiard Piramid is a form of pocket billiards played on a modified snooker table with narrower pockets. A variant with colored balls modeled on those of pool is known as Russian pool. In Western countries, the game is known as pyramid billiards, or simply pyramid within professional circles.
instructions: Rules of the game : - Take the first blow - break the pyramid. - Pick any ball and hit another ball with it. - Your own ball can only be pocketed if it touches another ball. - Hit 8 balls first to win. - Penalties-skip the move, imposed if the ball flew out of the field and if the ball did not touch another ball - The force of the blow affects the accuracy of the sight

title: Tennis Open 2020
description: The excitement and flair of the tennis world are ready for you! Pick up a racket and ace your way through every significant tennis event in the world! Can you win? Can you overcome it all? Train hard, play hard and become an unbeatable legend. Reach the top and write history. Prove yourself and triumph!
instructions: All rules and regulations of tennis apply. Enter a match, take your position and defeat your opponent. Use your skill and become a legend.

title: Pixel Skate
description: Have you ever been dreamed of being a skater and do many difficult stunts? Now you have the chance. Complete 24 levels and avoid all obstacles. It's not easy, so be careful and Good Luck!
instructions: PC: Left arrow to stop. Up arrow to jump Phone: Touch left side to stop. Touch right side to jump.

title: Volley ball
description: Volley Ball is a kids sport game.You must try to hit the ball with your hands and earn points by touching the stars in the start screen. Whenever you do not hit the ball correctly and the ball hits the ground you lose.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Cube Surfer
description: Cube Surfer is a cool and funny 3D running game. There will be a lot of dangers and some squares on the track. You can jump up, so you can stack two cubes together. It's very easy to operate. Slide on the screen to avoid obstacles and move towards the end point flexibly. How many levels can you reach in the Cube Surfer?
instructions: Slide on the screen to play

title: Cricket 2020
description: Do you have match-winning skills? You are the last wicket and you have to score as much as you can to lead your team to victory. So wear your helmet & pad up to be a match-winner. Improve your batting skills & show some cool cricket shots with "Cricket 2020".
instructions: Tap to hit the shot

title: Pool 8 Ball Mania
description: The classic eight-ball pool for your phone! Play against a computer controlled opponent or against a friend. Enjoy realistic ball physics and dynamic gameplay. Focus and use the aiming help to shoot the most precise shots.
instructions: Standard eight-ball pool rules apply. Aim and hit the cue ball to hit and pot the colourful balls into the pockets. Be careful to pot only your own balls (solids or stripes, depending on the first one you pot) and the black one afterwards.

title: Pocket Hockey
description: Hit the disc and make it roll all the way to the hole! Plan your moves carefully taking the obstacles into account.
instructions: Tap to hit the disc.

title: Catch The Balls
description: Unlimited balls catching.
instructions: Move mouse cursor left and right to catch the balls.

title: Pong Neon
description: Pong Neon is a classic pong tennis game in a cool neon theme. No bodies, no paddles. Do you have what it takes to beat the AI? Choose if you want the game mode to be normal or hard. Serve the ball and use your paddle to hit it back. Much fun with Pong Neon!
instructions: Use the arrows keys to move your paddle from left to right.

title: Pill Volley Beach
description: Would you like to play volleyball on a tropical island? If you want, play alone or with your friend. All you have to do in this fun game is to direct the character using the arrow keys on the screen or A-D-W keys and earn more points than your opponent.
instructions: Arrow Keys/WAD/Touch
